poem.title: Commute
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: The beasts! The foul Ignorant Beasts of the field. Mild Breists. The print Of beefs and hams On grass. Beliefs, Not for ruminants, soothe Eaters of meats Obese in their briefs, Two beats to the bar. But a goat goes in for Rooty beets and frosty grasses; It bleats As greens kellogulate And mists Turn over and go back to bleeps Alarm beeps sleep Snore the broker Lost his breeks And doesn't know Nothing but chickens have beaks.
